channel.title: How Do I change my Player Rights? (and other char. things?)
channel.description:
Okay. I got to the folder where it had characters. I clicked on it and it had my name (Lin) in notepad. It had all my stuff. Now i'd change my player rights and stats and log out. I'd log back in and nothing would change (even if i saved what I changed in notepad). And when i checked notepad what I had changed was back the way it was...Can someone tell me what is happening and how how to fix it?
With great thanks, Lin.

item.title: How Do I change my Player Rights? (and other char. things?)
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

You need to close all your MoparScape / Private Scape / Sources First…

Then You Open up Your Char’s Files then Edit + Save. Then Open Up your Source + MoparScape. Then You’re Done.

Note ->
Rights: 3 (You can’t see the Golden Crown)
Rights: 2 (You Can See the Golden Crown)
Rights: 1 (You Can See the Silver Crown)
Rights: 0 (You Are a Regular Player)

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I change my Player Rights? (and other char. things?)

nvm then…can’t help you it works for me but not you and im not taking pics because i deleted all my old stuff[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 10:27:54 PM[/size][hr]if you changed the player rights to 3 you will be a admin

but if you want to edit stats you need the level and xp or it will look like 99/1
